txt.en: Stabbed Trapdoor egg-sacs with Flesh-gnawer fangs ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Stabbed Flesh-gnawer egg-sacs with Trapdoor fangs ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The broods of the Wovenvales may be vulnerable to each other's venom.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Note: This quest is intended for a full fellowship.</rgb>
You should use the fangs you collected to envenom the egg-sacs of the Wovenvale spiders

'If I have guessed right, venom of the trapdoor-spiders will be poisonous to the flesh-gnawer spiders, and the opposite will hold true as well!'\n\nThoroniel scrapes the venom from the spider-fangs and pours it into two bottles. 'Return to the Wovenvales and pour one brood's venom onto egg sacs of the other, [placeholder]. Let us put an end to this spider-threat before the eggs hatch and the trapdoor and flesh-gnawer spiders pour out into the Trollshaws...and then beyond!'

Egg-sacs of both the Trapdoor and Flesh-gnawer broods may be found in the Wovenvales, in the north-west corner of the North Trollshaws, north of Thoroniel's camp.\n\nYou should use the fangs you collected to envenom the egg-sacs of the Wovenvale spiders.

'You have returned! Did you have enough venom for all of the egg-sacs you found?\n\n'I sense the winds turning in our direction, [placeholder]. The Wovenvales will soon be free of the trapdoor and flesh-gnawer spiders. I can feel it.'
Thoroniel is outside the Wovenvales in the North Trollshaws.\n\nThe Elf-scout Thoroniel is waiting to hear whether you successfully made use of the venom-bottles she gave you.

'You will find the egg sacs of the trapdoor-spiders and those of the flesh-gnawer spiders within the Wovenvales, guarded by their respective broods. Pour venom belonging to each brood on egg sacs of the other, and we may be able to halt the spread of spiders into the rest of the Trollshaws!'
'You have not returned with the bottles of venom I gave you? Why have you failed to do this?'

Egg-sacs of both the Trapdoor and Flesh-gnawer broods may be found in the Wovenvales, in the north-west corner of the North Trollshaws, north of Thoroniel's camp.

You should use the fangs you collected to envenom the egg-sacs of the Wovenvale spiders.

<rgb=#FF0000>Note: This quest is intended for a full fellowship.</rgb>
Stab Trapdoor egg-sacs with Flesh-gnawer fangs ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Stab Flesh-gnawer egg-sacs with Trapdoor fangs ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

Egg-sacs of both the Trapdoor and Flesh-gnawer broods may be found in the Wovenvales, in the north-west corner of the North Trollshaws, north of Thoroniel's camp.\n\nYou should use the fangs you collected to envenom the egg-sacs of the Wovenvale spiders.
